author: yeckang
body:
#### PR description:

* Re-organizing the plots in GEM Validation
* Small bug fix in 1D efficiency plot in GEM Validation
* 2D plots in GEM Validation is not generated in default.
* New matching method between the GEM objects and muon sim hit with using GEMDigiSimLink
* The update is presented in GEM DPG general meeting ([link to the slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/997112/contributions/4189296/attachments/2174041/3670734/19_Jan_2021_GEMValidationTool.pdf))
* Optimised for release validation

#### PR validation:

* The branch has tested with following commands to check if it works in 2 different geometry versions.
```
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 31011.0
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 23211.0
```
* The code format has applied with `scram build code-format`

@jshlee @watson-ij
title: Gem validation update
